heading: Plots (Drama, novel, etc.).
general-note: Here are entered works on the construction and analysis of plots as a literary vehicle. General collections of plots are entered under. Literature--Stories, plots, etc.. Collections of plots limited to specific literatures or genres are entered under headings for individual literatures or genres with subdivision. Stories, plots, etc.,. e.g.. English literature--Stories, plots, etc.; Drama--Stories, plots, etc.; American poetry--Stories, plots, etc.. Collections or discussions of plots of individual literary authors are entered under the name of the author with the subdivision. Stories, plots, etc..
